name: Guardian
description: A large humanoid creature with notable physical attributes, it is equipped with a chain shirt and exhibits impressive Strength and Constitution.
memorable: The Guardian can teleport through shadows, leaving a trail of ink-like smoke behind.
goals: To serve as a powerful protector and defender in combat situations.
relations: Related to shadow fey and other guardians; often operates in conjunction with stealthy creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark or shadowy areas, where it can utilize its abilities to their fullest.
strengths: Immunities to charm and fright, enhanced perception in darkness, and strong melee capabilities.
weaknesses: Susceptible to sunlight, which imposes disadvantages on attack rolls and sight-based checks.
attacks: Can make two melee attacks with a Pike or Javelin, dealing significant piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Shadow Traveler allows the Guardian to vanish in shadows and reappear within 30 feet, enhancing its mobility.
equipment: Pike and Javelin, utilized for ranged and melee attacks.
senses: Possesses a keen sense of perception, granting advantage on perception checks in magical darkness.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and Perception, making it an effective tracker and grappler.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed.
Cannot be put to sleep by magic.
Disadvantage on attack rolls and sight-based perception checks in sunlight.
Multiattack feature for increased combat effectiveness.
Protective Interference reduces threats to allies.
test_queries: large humanoid guardian that defends allies
Guardian with keen perception in darkness
formidable melee combatant with charm immunity
